whatIs.title: What is LegalHelp AI Banking?
whatIs.description: LegalHelp AI Banking is the specialized DocumentoIQ product designed for financial institutions that handle large volumes of regulated documentation. It uses artificial intelligence to analyze banking files, validate information, and generate automated legal opinions, helping legal teams work with greater speed, precision, and traceability.
whatIs.disclaimer: LegalHelp AI Banking does not make decisions for the bank. It functions as an intelligent assistant that accelerates document review and points out only the incidents that require human analysis.
